name: Express, Examine, Evolve
description: A deep-dive tool for self-reflection and growth

sections.title: Express
sections.placeholder: Let it all out. Raw, unfiltered, true feelings. No judgment, no editing, just release.

sections.title: Examine
sections.placeholder: Explore the roots by asking yourself the hard questions. Use a 'Question:' and 'Answer:' format to dig into what's beneath the surface, what triggered the response, old patterns, unmet needs, and where the shame or fear is hiding.

sections.title: Evolve
sections.placeholder: Create the change. Design new responses, reframe your perspective, set actionable steps, and identify your growth edge.
